name: Pocketeers Limited
tag_list: game-developer, application-developer, iphone, ipad, android, wp7, bada, blackberry, symbian, java, nintendo
overview:
Game and Application software developer based in the United Kingdom

Pocketeers develops gaming and application software across a wide range of portable platforms including consoles, smartphones, tablets such as Apple iPhone, iPad, iPod, Google Android, Windows Phone 7, Samsung Bada, Blackberry, Symbian Java Mobile and Nintendo platforms

Pocketeers acts as an outsourcing company developing products on behalf of others as well as developing and marketing its own unique products
